quotes.quote: You can't solve a dignity problem with military force.
We should not give up and we should not allow the problem to defeat us.
Every problem has in it the seeds of its own solution. If you don't have any problems, you don't get any seeds.
Inside of every problem lies an opportunity.
The greatest problem in the world today is intolerance. Everyone is so intolerant of each other.
We cannot solve our problems with the same thinking we used when we created them.
Never bring the problem solving stage into the decision making stage. Otherwise, you surrender yourself to the problem rather than the solution.
Don't bother people for help without first trying to solve the problem yourself.
When you confront a problem you begin to solve it.
Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
The government solution to a problem is usually as bad as the problem.
The world's problem is not too many people, but lack of political and economic freedom.
The definition of a good mathematical problem is the mathematics it generates rather than the problem itself.
To every problem there is already a solution, whether you know it or not. To every sum in there is already a correct answer, whether the mathematician has found it or not.
If you have a positive attitude and constantly strive to give your best effort, eventually you will overcome your immediate problems and find you are ready for greater challenges.
A problem is a chance for you to do your best.
Death is the solution to all problems. No man - no problem.
There is but one truly serious philosophical problem and that is suicide.

The problem is never how to get new, innovative thoughts into your mind, but how to get old ones out. Every mind is a building filled with archaic furniture. Clean out a corner of your mind and creativity will instantly fill it.
The problem is not that there are problems. The problem is expecting otherwise and thinking that having problems is a problem.
Corruption is not a problem just for some countries; this is a global issue.
When you have solved the problem of controlling the attention of the child, you have solved the entire problem of its education.
Expect problems and eat them for breakfast.
To a poet the mere making of a poem can seem to solve the problem of truth...but only a problem of art is solved in poetry.
A problem well stated is a problem half-solved.
Loneliness is the universal problem of rich people.
If you procrastinate when faced with a big difficult problem... break the problem into parts, and handle one part at a time.
The best way to resolve any problem in the human world is for all sides to sit down and talk.

Leadership is solving problems. The day soldiers stop bringing you their problems is the day you have stopped leading them. They have either lost confidence that you can help or concluded you do not care. Either case is a failure of leadership.
No problem is so formidable that you can't walk away from it.
